Banasthali Vidyapith is a women's university located in Rajasthan, India. It was established in 1935 by eminent educationist and freedom fighter Pandit Hiralal Shastri as a residential university for women. Banasthali Vidyapith offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various disciplines, including arts, science, commerce, education, fine arts, social work, design, and more.

Banasthali Vidyapith is a women's university located in Rajasthan, India.It provides a conducive environment for women to pursue their education and empowers them to become confident, independent, and socially responsible individuals. The campus is known for its serene and beautiful surroundings, providing an ideal atmosphere for learning and personal development

utterances: What are the requirements for admission?
What do I need to get admitted?
answers: The admission requirements may vary depending on the college and program you're interested in. Generally, they include academic qualifications, test scores, and sometimes interviews. It's best to check the specific requirements of the college you're considering.

utterances: What is the deadline to apply?
When do I need to submit my application?
answers: Application deadlines can vary depending on the  program. It's crucial to check the official website or admissions office of the college you're interested in for the most up-to-date information. Missing deadlines could impact your chances of admission.

The application deadlines differ from program to program. It's essential to refer to the official website or contact the admissions office of the college you're interested in to find the accurate application deadline. Submitting your application on time is important to ensure your eligibility for admission.

utterances: Is there academic support available for students?
Can you tell me about the learning resources?
answers: Yes, we provide academic support services for students. We offer tutoring services where you can receive assistance in various subjects. Our college also has learning resource centers where you can access reference materials, online resources, and academic databases. Additionally, we organize workshops and study skills programs to help students enhance their learning abilities. Feel free to reach out to our academic support team for more information.

utterances: How can I apply for admission?
Tell me about the admission requirements.
answers:
To apply for admission, you can follow the steps.

Visit the official college website and navigate to the admissions section.
Read the admission guidelines and requirements thoroughly.
Fill out the online application form with accurate and complete information.
Upload the necessary documents as mentioned in the application form.
Pay the application fee, if applicable.
Submit the application form within the specified deadline.
The admission process may involve various stages such as entrance exams, interviews, and document verification. The college will evaluate your application based on the provided information and the admission criteria. It is important to review the admission requirements, deadlines, and any specific instructions mentioned on the college website.
If you have any further questions or need assistance regarding the admission process, it is recommended to contact the college admission office or the designated admissions helpline for accurate and detailed information.

utterances: Tell me about the library facilities
What types of libraries are available in the college?
Can you provide information about the college library?
answers:
Our college provides both central and departmental libraries for students and faculty members.
The Central Library is a well-equipped facility that houses a vast collection of books, journals, research papers, and digital resources. It offers a quiet and conducive environment for studying and research.
In addition to the Central Library, we have departmental libraries that cater to the specific needs of different academic departments. These libraries contain subject-specific books, reference materials, and research resources.
Both the central and departmental libraries are managed by qualified librarians who are available to assist and support users in their information needs.

utterances: When will the results be announced?
How can I check my exam results?
Tell me about the result declaration process.
answers:
The college publish the results online on their official website.Typically, results are announced within a specified timeframe after the completion of exams. Students are usually required to fill their credentials to view and download their results.
If you have any specific queries regarding your exam results, it is advisable to reach out to the examination department or the concerned authorities for assistance.

utterances: Can I schedule a campus tour?
How can I visit the college campus?
answers: Absolutely! We encourage prospective students to visit our campus. You can schedule a campus tour by contacting our admissions office. We offer guided tours where you'll have the opportunity to explore our facilities, interact with current students, and learn more about our college community. It's a great way to get a firsthand experience of our campus environment. We look forward to showing you around!

utterances: What is the academic calendar for the college?
Are there any breaks during the academic year?
answers: The academic calendar may vary slightly from year to year, but typically our semesters start in July. Throughout the academic year, there are scheduled breaks, including a Summer break. You can find the detailed academic calendar, including semester start dates, holidays, and other important dates, on our college website or by contacting the registrar's office.

The canteens are a hub to birthday parties and special occasion for students of Banasthali University. In Campus, there are several canteens in New and Old Market. There are 9 canteens in banasthali. Shanus, Annapurna, Mukteshwari, Desi Zykaa, Jaipur Eats, etc. All variety of vegeterian food is available in the canteens.(Only Veg Food is allowed inside the campus)

utterances: How much are the tuition fees?
What is the cost of education?
answers: The tuition fees vary depending on the program you choose. It's best to refer to our college website or contact our admissions office for detailed information about the fee structure.

utterances: Does the college provide career services?
Can you tell me about internships and co-op programs?
answers: Yes, we have a dedicated career services department that offers support to students in their career development. Our college provides various job placement opportunities through partnerships with local and national companies. We also offer internship programs and cooperative education (co-op) programs to help students gain practical work experience. Our career services team can assist you with resume building, interview preparation, and connecting with potential employers.

utterances: What are the facilities provided in the college hostel?
Can you tell me about the amenities in the hostel?
What is available in the hostel for students?
answers: Our college hostel offers a range of facilities to ensure a comfortable living environment for students. Each room is equipped with basic furniture, including a bed, study table, and chair. We provide common areas for socializing, such as a lounge and recreation room. The hostel also has laundry facilities, Wi-Fi access, and 24/7 security. Additionally, there are designated dining areas where students can have their meals. Feel free to contact the hostel administration for more specific details.

utterances: What are the rules and regulations of the college hostel?
Are there any specific guidelines for living in the hostel?
Can you tell me about the code of conduct in the hostel?
answers: To ensure a safe and harmonious living environment, we have specific rules and regulations for our college hostel. Some common rules include adhering to quiet hours, maintaining cleanliness in the rooms and common areas, and respecting the privacy of fellow residents. We also have guidelines related to guest visits, curfew timings, and the use of hostel facilities. It's important for students to familiarize themselves with the hostel handbook provided during the orientation. Our hostel staff is always available to address any concerns or queries regarding the rules.

utterances: How can I apply for a hostel room?
What is the process of getting a hostel accommodation?
When should I submit my hostel application?
answers: To apply for a hostel room, you can fill out the hostel accommodation form available on our college website or obtain it from the hostel administration office. The application usually requires personal details, preferred room type, and any specific requirements you may have. The specific deadlines and procedures can be found on our college administration directly.

utterances: What is the dress code for students?
Are there any specific clothing guidelines?
Can you tell me about the college's dress code policy?
answers: Our college has a dress code policy that promotes a professional and respectful environment. There is blue Khadi Kurta and Salwar/Pant to wear compulsory on Wednesday and Sunday. While other day any cotton/khadi kurta and salwar/pant, we encourage students to dress modestly and in a manner that is appropriate for an educational setting. It is important to avoid clothing that may be deemed offensive, overly revealing, or disruptive to the learning environment. The detailed dress code guidelines can be found in the student handbook or by contacting the college administration.

utterances: Can you provide information about scholarships?
How can I apply for scholarships?
answers: Yes, we offer scholarships to eligible students to support their education. Our college provides various scholarship opportunities based on academic merit, financial need, or specific criteria set by donors. To apply for scholarships, you can visit administration directly and you will find information about the available scholarships, eligibility criteria, application deadlines, and the application process. Make sure to review the requirements and submit your application before the deadline to be considered for scholarships.

utterances: What festivals are celebrated in the college?
Tell me about the cultural events in the college.
Are there any annual festivals or events?
answers: Our college celebrates various festivals and cultural events throughout the year. Some of the popular annual festivals include Holi, Navratri. These events provide an opportunity for students to showcase their talents, participate in performances, and engage in cultural activities. The college also organizes workshops, competitions, and guest lectures during these festivals. Keep an eye on the college calendar and social media platforms for updates on upcoming festivals and events.

utterances: What sports activities are available in the college?
Can you tell me about the sports facilities?
Are there any sports clubs or teams?
answers: Our college offers a range of Five-Fold Activities(Panchmukhi Shiksha) to cater to students' interests and promote a healthy lifestyle. We have well-equipped sports facilities, including a gymnasium, athletic fields, tennis courts, and indoor sports halls. Students can participate in various sports, such as football, basketball, cricket, volleyball, badminton, and more. We also have sports clubs and teams that compete in intercollegiate tournaments and leagues. Whether you're a beginner or a competitive athlete, there are opportunities for everyone to engage in sports and stay active.

The morning fitness programme starts at 6.00 a.m. in summer & 6.30 a.m. in winter includes Yogasans, Marshal Arts, Conditioning and Fitness exercise, and Aerobics. All these activities are carried out simultaneously at different stations at Vidula Maidan. Students join various activities according to their interest & choice.The evening programme at Vidula Maidan starts at 4.30 pm. which includes match practice for various games like Basketball, Volleyball, Athletics, Hockey, Football, Tennis, Marshal Arts, Kho-Kho, Kabaddi, Handball, Netball, Softball, Archery, Cricket & Swimming (Seasonal).Usually holidays and Tuesdays are off days for sports.
